full_text: MILLA KAL CARDIGAN Join the Milla KAL ! Milla is a cardigan knitted from the light and fluffy Novita Hehku yarn, and it can be styled in many different ways. Choose your favorite version of the cardigan from 4 different options : Milla Classic , Milla Cropped , Milla Long & Milla Wrap . This versatile cardigan is a true wardrobe staple. The Milla cardigan pattern is suitable even for beginners, and it includes four different versions, a wide size range from XS to 5XL, and numerous color options. You can also easily adapt the pattern to suit your own style: choose whether you want short, three-quarter, or long sleeves for your Milla cardigan, and finish it off with details like pockets, buttons, or ties. Choose your favorite version, buy the yarn, and join the knit-along! A new part of the pattern will be released on Novita.com every Monday starting June 16th. Pattern is divided in 5 sections and the last part of the pattern will be released on Monday 14th of July. The Milla cardigan is knitted with Novita Hehku , a striking mohair blend yarn made of 60% mohair and 40% wool. Over 20 color options available in Novita’s online store! Sizes XS(S)M(L)XL(2XL)3XL(4XL)5XL Finished dimensions Body circumference 96(104)112(120)128(136)144(152)160 cm / 37.75(41)44(47.25)50.5(53.5)56.75(59.75)63 in Sleeve and Back length varies in different Milla versions - check the pattern page for more details. Milla Classic Milla Cropped Milla Long Milla Wrap Needles and other supplies Circular needles (80 cm) Novita 5 mm and double-pointed needles 5 mm (if you’re not using the Magic Loop technique for the sleeves), or according to your gauge. For the ribbing, circular needle (80 cm) Novita 4.5 mm and double-pointed needles 4.5 mm. Other supplies: 4 stitch markers and 4 buttons, 20 mm in diameter. Pattern designer: Piia Maria Pekkanen
